github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: This dev container includes the conda package manager pre-installed and available on the `PATH` for data science and Python development. Additional packages installed using Conda will be downloaded from Anaconda or another repository configured by the user. A user can install different versions of Python than the one in this dev container by running a command like: conda install python=3.7
